activities:
adBrite is an advertising exchange where third party advertisers may distribute online advertisements to advertising zones located on Internet websites that are owned or operated by other third parties.  

Advertisers and Publishers can manage their accounts on our exchange through a self-service account management interface located at adbrite.com.  

Some of our subscribers (advertisers and publishers) are located in Europe.  Data they enter into our online interface, including personal information, may be stored and/or processed by data hubs and data centers located inside or outside of Europe.  Accordingly, such subscriber data may be transferred outside of the EU.
contacttitle1: Director of Trust & Safety and CS
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online data of subscribers (advertisers and publishers)
privacyprograms: We are a member of the TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor Privacy Program.
recoursemech: We use TRUSTe as a third party dispute resolution mechanism.
